column4: can anyone tell me why ubuntu 6.06 is not recognizing my external usb hard disks?
I can plug in a compact flash card in the 6-in-1 reader and it pops up on the desktop but the hard disks aren't recognized
dmesg doesn't give any clues either
try, to "sudo modprobe " them, one by one, sd_mod sg ehci-hcd uhci-hcd usb-storage
